description:
Abraham is 19 and recently single. He broke up with his girlfriend of a year and a half and is just now starting to get out and experience things as a single guy.

He’s a soft-spoken, well-mannered Southern guy who has been an athlete since he was in grade school, doing everything from football, baseball and track to swimming, skateboarding and motocross.

Abraham has a tall, lean, smooth frame with nice pecs and a big dick, one that he likes to jack off with two hands. He likes to slap it around a lot and, well, let's just say he can get some distance when the time comes!

One great thing about Abraham — he’s always hard. He can get an erection almost instantaneously. It didn’t matter where we were — at the beach or out hiking the trails — this guy is a walking hard on...
title: Abraham
